name: Spellcraft (LunarPenguinMedia)
description:
Vampire Survivors meets Magicka in this spell-crafting adventure!

Delve into the world of Spellcraft to discover over 28,000 spell combinations. Use these spells to fight against demon housewares, as you plunge into an unfamiliar world. As you fight, you will level up and gain rewards to power-up your spells and craft new ones!

This is a game of crafting experimentation, powered by a gameplay loop with high replay value. If you enjoy roguelikes, crafting games, or arcade games, you should definitely play this!

Over time, we will be adding more spells, rewards, and permanent bonuses to the game. Stay tuned for updates!

Tip: When you start fighting, open the pause menu to see the controls.
